name: GetLibraryStyleUsageData
description:
Retrieve style usage data from Figma library analytics.

This tool returns library analytics style usage data from Figma, broken down by the requested dimension. It should be used to analyze style usage within a specific Figma library file.

parameters.name: group_by_dimension
parameters.description: Dimension to group the returned analytics data by. Options are 'style' or 'file'.

value_schema.description: A dimension to group returned analytics data by.

parameters.name: library_file_key
parameters.description: The file key of the Figma library to fetch analytics data for. This is required to specify the source library.

value_schema.description: File key of the library to fetch analytics data for.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Cursor indicating which page of data to fetch, obtained from a previous API call.

value_schema.description: Cursor indicating what page of data to fetch. Obtained from prior API call.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the figma API.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor indicating what page of data to fetch. Obtained from prior API call.

value_schema.description: Cursor indicating what page of data to fetch. Obtained from prior API call.

parameters.name: group_by
parameters.description: A dimension to group returned analytics data by.

value_schema.description: A dimension to group returned analytics data by.

parameters.name: file_key
parameters.description: File key of the library to fetch analytics data for.

value_schema.description: File key of the library to fetch analytics data for.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
